column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: day. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: @prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix day: <http://www.example.org/day#> .day:Day a rdfs:Class ;      rdfs:label "Day"@en ;      rdfs:comment "Class representing a day of the week."@en .day:Monday a day:Day ;       rdfs:label "Monday"@en ;       rdfs:comment "Representation of Monday."@en .day:Tuesday a day:Day ;       rdfs:label "Tuesday"@en ;       rdfs:comment "Representation of Tuesday."@en .day:Wednesday a day:Day ;       rdfs:label "Wednesday"@en ;       rdfs:comment "Representation of Wednesday."@en .day:Thursday a day:Day ;       rdfs:label "Thursday"@en ;       rdfs:comment "Representation of Thursday."@en .day:Friday a day:Day ;       rdfs:label "Friday"@en ;       rdfs:comment "Representation of Friday."@en .day:Saturday a day:Day ;       rdfs:label "Saturday"@en ;       rdfs:comment "Representation of Saturday."@en .day:Sunday a day:Day ;       rdfs:label "Sunday"@en ;       rdfs:comment "Representation of Sunday."@en .day:part_of_week a rdf:Property ;       rdfs:label "Part of week"@en ;       rdfs:domain day:Day ;       rdfs:range xsd:string .day:Monday day:part_of_week "week"^^xsd:string .day:Tuesday day:part_of_week "week"^^xsd:string .day:Wednesday day:part_of_week "week"^^xsd:string .day:Thursday day:part_of_week "week"^^xsd:string .day:Friday day:part_of_week "week"^^xsd:string .day:Saturday day:part_of_week "weekend"^^xsd:string .day:Sunday day:part_of_week "weekend"^^xsd:string .
